projects.title: Azure Resume Challenge
projects.description: This is a digital resume completely hosted on Azure with my own custom domain. I used a ton of Azure services to complete this project with very minimal cost (we love that���).

projects.title: Azure Static Web Apps
projects.description: This project has two separate learning parts. First, building a web app by using Gatsby web framework. Secondly, serving this portfolio website to the world by taking advantage of Azure Static Web Apps (for FREE���.

projects.title: Bash-based CLI Uploader Tool
projects.description: The azure-upload CLI tool is your new best friend for chucking files into Azure storage! It's like magic but with a progress bar. Just run it, sit back, and watch your files zoom to the cloud in style.✨������

projects.title: Virtual Mail Server with Docker-Mailserver
projects.description: A complete email server solution using Docker-Mailserver with secure configuration, anti-spam protection, and modern email protocols. Features automated deployment, SSL/TLS encryption, and comprehensive email security measures.

projects.title: Running Containerized Applications with Docker
projects.description: Comprehensive Docker containerization project focusing on application deployment, optimization, and lifecycle management. Demonstrates advanced container orchestration, persistent data handling, and network configuration best practices.

projects.title: Setup Web + DNS + WordPress
projects.description: Complete web infrastructure setup with custom DNS configuration and WordPress deployment. Features Ubuntu server configuration, Docker containerization, BIND9 DNS management, Apache web server, and WordPress CMS integration.
